#### 2018 Mike Trout

Illustrate the process of constructing two types of graphs of Mike Trout's launch speeds over the zone.

Load the package:

```{r}
library(CalledStrike)
```

#### Heat Map

```{r}
collect_player("Mike Trout") %>% 
  setup_inplay() %>%
  ls_gam_fit() %>%
  tile_plot_m() +
  ggtitle("MikeTrout") +
  centertitle() +
  increasefont()
```

#### Filled Contour Graph

```{r}
collect_player("Mike Trout") %>% 
  setup_inplay() %>%
  ls_gam_fit() %>%
  contour_plot_m(M = seq(50, 100, by = 5), gtype = "f") +
  ggtitle("Mike Trout") +
  centertitle() +
  increasefont()
```
